```js
class SpeedDialExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { show: false };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <Button onClick={() => this.setState({ show: !this.state.show })}>
          Toggle speed dial
        </Button>
        {this.state.show && (
          <SpeedDial icon="home">
            <SpeedDialItem icon="email" />
            <SpeedDialItem icon="chat" />
            <SpeedDialItem icon="call" />
          </SpeedDial>
        )}
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<SpeedDialExample />;
```
